page.title: 12HEDGEROWS AND WOODLAND
page.content: Near Lower Halls in the hedges there is a wide selection of flowers and grasses.These include cow parsley, thistle, brambles, dog roses, gorse and pink campions.Also in the hedge are rabbit burrows and smaller holes belonging to shrews.The hedge is 2 meters thick and about the same height.On the outside of the hedge is a ditch for drainage and cow parsley with{timothy}and barley grass grow there.There are also a few small trees growing that include {ash, beech and {oak.} Ivyleaf Wood covers over 2 acres and is made up of oak,ash,beech and hazel trees.The main trees are evenly spread and quite mature.The undergrowth is mainly bramble, ferns, pink campion and foxgloves.Wildlife includes foxes, rabbits and wood pigeons.
